page.title: 04Quainton Church Fete
page.content: On Saturday 13th July the annual fete was held in the grounds of the old rectoy.It began at 2.30 pm and through- out the afternoon music was provided by the Great Horwood Band.There were lots of side-shows and stalls including a white elephant stall,a bottle stall, bowling,a plant stall,spinning Jenny, and roll the coin.There was also a raffle with lots of prizes to be won, Ice creams,soft drinks,strawberry cream teas and other refreshments were sold throughout the afternoon.Children had their faces painted to look like clowns,cats or pirates.There was an obstacle course and at 3.30 pm there was a wheelbarrow race around the village green and back. The fete raised over 700 pounds for the church organ fund.
